A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars fan\, this was one of the worst movies\, it just doesn't respect how Star Wars was made\, it has a plethora of extremelly dull and political correct characters\, useless and unimaginative story arcs\, dissapointing battles\, little to no use of the droids\, and terrible character development\, it doesn't live up to the hype generated by the 7th.
